title: Thinking It Through - method of development

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best describes the primary way the author develops his line of reasoning in the passage?

choices.label: He stages a discussion between his own point of view and two other points of view to show why his is the most convincing.
He provides a narrative of the different views he has held on this issue to show how his thinking has evolved over time.
He introduces several seemingly reasonable ideas about this issue and then questions the premises of those ideas.
He emphasizes the importance of this issue and then explores the shortcomings of previous approaches to the issue.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
